short_summary: Purchase of vials and septa caps capable of retaining a microaerophilic gas mixture.
description: Purchase of vials and septa caps capable of retaining a microaerophilic gas mixture.CLOSING DATE: 2023-10-04T14:00:00 PUBLICATION DATE: 2023-09-14. PROCUREMENT CATEGORY: Goods. PROCUREMENT METHOD: Competitive - Selective tendering.
full_summary:
**Request for Proposal: TEM Vials and Caps**

**Announcement Reference:** cb-9108-81077254

**Posting Date:** September 14, 2023
**Closing Date:** October 4, 2023, 14:00:00 EST

**Overview:**
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites proposals from qualified vendors for the purchase of TEM vials and caps capable of retaining a microaerophilic gas mixture. This requirement is posted under the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).

**Key Specifications:**

* UNSPSC Code: 41121800 (General laboratory glassware and plasticware and supplies)
* Trade Agreements: CCFTA

**Proposal Content:**
Proposals must be sent electronically through the Canadabuy site. Vendors must demonstrate their ability to meet the required specifications and ensure timely delivery to CFIA.

**Vendor Information:**

* Agency Contact: Nadege Muhimpundu
* Email: Nadege.Muhimpundu@inspection.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 548-2095

**Important Dates:**

* Closing Date: October 4, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 30, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2028

**Proposal Package:**
The complete proposal package can be downloaded from the Canadabuy site:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9108/2024-00040-npp.pdf

**Note:** Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Canadabuy site by October 4, 2023, 14:00:00 EST. Any proposals received after the closing date will be rejected. To receive more information or to discuss the proposal, please contact the agency contact above.
